title.en: Race to Steal the Emperor's Heart

altTitles.id: Now I Will Take the Emperor's Heart

altTitles.zh-hk: 今天開始奪走皇帝的心

altTitles.th: เกมรักคว้าหัวใจจักรพรรดิ

description.de:
Ra Hyeon hat gerade die aufregende Neuigkeit erhalten, daß sie das Staatsexamen bestanden hat und ist auf dem Weg zur Jurafakultät. Aber was eigentlich einer der schönsten Tage ihres Lebens sein sollte, stellt sich als der schlimmste heraus, als sie durch den Schock einen Herzinfarkt erleidet und stirbt. Als sie während ihrer letzten Augenblicke um ihr Leben fleht, bekommt sie eine Chance, dem Tod zu entfliehen: Sie muß lediglich als die junge Adelige Daphne Kerrece leben und es schaffen, das Herz des Kaisers, ihrem zukünftigen Ehemann, zu gewinnen. Aber mit einer bedrohlichen Frist, einem Ehemann, der vor ihr schon vier andere Bräute verstoßen hat, und vielen Menschen, die sie scheitern sehen wollen, wird das alles nicht so einfach, wie es sich anhört. Und ist das letztendlich wirklich, was Ra Hyeon will?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6745215), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=784833)

**Official Translations:**

description.en:
Ra Hyeon just got the exciting news that she’s passed the Bar Exam and is headed to law school. But what should’ve been one of the best days of her life turns out to be the worst as the shock causes her to have a heart attack and die. As she pleads for her life in her final moments, she is given one last chance to evade death. All she has to do is live as Daphne Kerrece, the daughter of a noble household, and win the heart of her new husband, the emperor. But with a looming deadline, a husband who’s already cast away four brides before her, and many hoping to see her fail, this won’t be as easy as it sounds. And, when all is said and done, is it even what Ra Hyeon really wants?

---
Ra Hyun, who suddenly died of a heart attack, begs to be revived to the gods. Finally she comes back to life as Daphne in the Fiant Empire, But now her mission is that she must win the emperor's heart 100% so that she can return to life in her original world. Will she be able to obtain the emperor's heart and come back to her life?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6745215), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=784833)

description.es:
Ra Hyun nunca había estado tan feliz: ¡acabó de aprobar el examen de abogada! Pero justo en ese momento... murió. O al menos eso creía hasta que hizo un trato con una fuerza misteriosa. ¿El problema? Si Ra Hyun quiere revivir, debe primero vivir en el cuerpo de una princesa medieval y ganarse el corazón del emperador. Aquí el amor será una espada de doble filo.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6745215), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=784833)

description.fr:
Ra Hyeon vient de recevoir d'excellentes nouvelles: elle a été reçue à l'examen du barreau et peut enfin intégrer l'école de droit, comme elle en avait toujours rêvé! Mais, lorsque le choc la fait mourir d'une crise cardiaque, ce qui aurait dû être le plus beau jour de sa vie, se transforme subitement en un véritable cauchemar. Alors qu'elle supplie quelqu'un de la sauver avant de rendre son dernier souffle, elle reçoit une dernière chance d'échapper à la mort. Tout ce qu'elle doit faire, c'est vivre en tant que Daphne Kerrece, la fille d'une famille noble, et faire chavirer le cœur de son nouvel époux, l'empereur du royaume. Mais avec une échéance imminente, un époux qui a déjà rejeté quatre épouses avant elle, et beaucoup de personnes qui souhaitent la voir échouer, la tâche ne sera pas si simple que ça. Et une fois l'objectif atteint, Ra Hyeon sera-t-elle satisfaite?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6745215), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=784833)

description.id:
Ra Hyun, yang mendadak meninggal karena artimia, mohon dihidupkan kembali kepada dewa. Akhirnya dia hidup kembali sebagai Daphne di Kekaisaran Fiant, Namun sekarang misinya adalah dia harus merebut hati kaisar 100% agar dia bisa kembali hidup di dunia asalnya. Apakah dia bisa memperoleh hati kaisar dan hidup kembali?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6745215), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=784833)

description.ko:
오랜 고시생활 끝에 합격한 라 현. 
최종합격 메시지를 받고 기쁨에 몸부림치던 그때, 지병인 부정맥이 그녀의 심장을 멎게 만든다.  
고통을 느끼기도 전, 영혼이 되어버린 그녀의 앞에 나타난 의문의 인물 ‘신’. 
‘신’은 현의 목숨을 살려주겠다며 게임을 제안한다. 황제의 마음을 빼앗아 호감도 100%로 만드는 것. 

다프네 케레스에 빙의한 라 현과 호감도 0%로 시작된 황제와의 결혼식, 그리고 밝혀지는 ‘황후’의 의미. 

“……황제께서는 결혼식에 참석이 어려우시다고.” 
“…허울뿐인 결혼식. 어차피 제물로 바쳐질 텐데 뭐.” 

다시 살아날 방법은 오직 하나! 
누구도 사랑하지 못하는 황제의 마음을 빼앗아라! 

마침내… 황제의 호감도 99%… 

“너무 아름다워. 나의 황후. 다프네. 사랑해.” 
“아니, 아직은- 아직은 안 돼!” 

사랑할수록 이별해야만 하는 다프네와 하이스 
절망이 예고된 두 사람의 찌통 가득한 사랑 이야기.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6745215), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=784833)

description.pt-br:
Ela foi aprovada após uma longa vida em exames. Quando ela recebe a mensagem de aprovação e contorcia-se em alegria, sua arritmia, uma doença crônica, faz seu coração parar. O misterioso personagem, “Deus”, aparece em sua frente, que, agora, se tornou uma alma, antes mesmo de sentir alguma dor. “Deus” lhe propõe um jogo em troca de salvar sua vida. Capturar o coração do imperador e alcançar 100% de sua favorabilidade. O casamento entre Daphne Kehres e o Imperador que começou com 0% de favorabilida, e o significado de “Imperatriz” é revelado. “…o Imperador não pode participar do casamento.” “…um casamento ilusório será oferecido como uma oferta de qualquer maneira.” Só há uma maneira de voltar à vida! Pegar o coração de um imperador que não ama ninguém! Finalmente… a favorabilidade do imperador é de 99%… “Você é tão bonita. Minha Imperatriz, Daphne. Eu te amo.” “Não, ainda não– ainda não!” A história de amor entre Daphne e Hyce, que quando mais se amam, mais próximos estão de se separar.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6745215), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=784833)

description.th:
หลังจากตั้งใจเรียนมาอย่างยาวนานและหนักหน่วง ในที่สุด 'ราฮยอน'​ ก็สอบผ่านอย่างที่ตั้งใจ ด้วยความที่เธอดีใจมาก จู่ ๆ ดันหัวใจวายตายซะอย่างนั้น เมื่อลืมตาอีกที เธอได้พบกับบุคคลลึกลับที่คาดว่าน่าจะเป็น 'พระเจ้า'​ และชวนให้เธอเล่นเกมชิงหัวใจของจักรพรรดิในต่างโลก เธอต้องทำให้จักรพรรดิผู้เย็นชาตกหลุมรักให้ได้ เพื่อแลกกับการกลับมามีชีวิตอีกครั้ง!

---

description.zh:
因为肝司法考试而意外猝死的罗夏，与“神”签订了一个契约。只有在异世把皇帝的好感度刷满，才能重生，顺便附带一个能看到任何人好感度的金手指。只是这个冷淡又腹黑的陛下也太难攻略了吧！

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6745215), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=784833)
